Class OracleLobDBStore

java.lang.Object
  javazoom.upload.DBStore
      sample.OracleLobDBStore
public class OracleLobDBStore
extends javazoom.upload.DBStore

This class implements a DBStore for Oracle with Lob (Blob or Clob).

1.1
